scripts.clean:tmp: node -e "const fs=require('fs/promises');const p=require('path');(async()=>{const del=async x=>{try{await fs.rm(x,{recursive:true,force:true})}catch{}};const R=p.resolve;await Promise.all([del(R('qa-framework/tmp_docs')),del(R('qa-framework/tmp_exports')),del(R('qa-framework/packages/planner/tmp_review')),del(R('qa-framework/packages/planner/test/tmp_review_cli')),del(R('qa-framework/packages/planner/test/tmp_review_tests')),del(R('qa-framework/packages/planner/test/tmp_validation'))]);})();"
